com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions
Class IncludeLocal

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions.AbstractAction
      com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions.IncludeLocal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, DynamicallyParameterisable
public class IncludeLocal
extends AbstractAction
implements DynamicallyParameterisable

Includes a part of a template that was saved earlier. Upon execution, the include local action reads a template-scoped context variable that contains an action body and invokes it.

There are two ways to pass information to the included template:

  • The action supports dynamic parameters, all of which will be available within the template;
  • It's possible to used blocks in the action body, these can be invoked inside the included template using the block contents action.

See Also:
Template
